ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How tempted would you be to drink when you are emotionally upset (feeling down, angry, afraid or guilty)?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

ElementDescription: How tempted would you be to drink when around or seeing others who are drinking - such as during celebrations or on vacation?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

ElementDescription: How tempted would you be to drink when you experience physical pain, such as a headache, injury or are physically tired?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

ElementDescription: How tempted would you be to drink when you have thoughts of using - while either awake or dreaming?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

ElementDescription: How tempted would you be to drink when you are feeling a physical need or craving for alcohol?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

ElementDescription: How tempted would you be to drink when you have an urge to try just one drink to see what happens?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = Not very; 3 = Moderately; 4 = Very; 5 = Extremely

ElementDescription: AASE Temptation Sum Score
Notes: 999=Missing value

ElementDescription: AASE Self-Efficacy Sum Score
Notes: 999=Missing value

ElementDescription: AASE Composite Score
Notes: Subtract the scores from confidence (self-efficacy) minus temptation

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: PLEASANT TIMES WITH OTHERS (for example, if I wanted to celebrate with a friend, or if I was enjoying myself at a party and wanted to feel even better). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: UNPLEASANT EMOTIONS (for example, if I were depressed about things in general, or if everything was going badly for me). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: PHYSICAL DISCOMFORT (for example, if I was having trouble sleeping, or if I felt jumpy and physically tense). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: PLEASANT EMOTIONS (for example, if something good was happening and I felt like celebrating, or if everything was going well). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: TESTING CONTROL OVER MY USE OF ALCOHOL or DRUGS (for example, if I started to believe that alcohol was no longer a problem for me, or if I felt confident that I could handle several drinks). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: URGES AND TEMPTATIONS (for example, if I suddenly had an urge to drink, if I was in a situation where I had often drank heavily, or if I began to think of how good a rush or high had felt). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: CONFLICT WITH OTHERS (for example, if I had an argument with a friend, or if I was not getting along with others at work). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: Indicate how confident you feel right now that you would be able to resist drinking heavily in each situation: SOCIAL PRESSURE TO USE (for example, if someone pressured me to be a good sport and drink with them, or if I was invited to someones home and offered a drink). I feel:
Notes: 0= Not Confident At All 0 percent; 10= 10 percent; 20 percent; 30= 30 percent; 40= 40 percent; 50= 50 percent; 60= 60 percent; 70= 70 percent; 80= 80 percent; 90= 90 percent; 100= Totally Confident 100 percent; 888= No Response

ElementDescription: How confident are you right now that you would be able to stop drinking heavily if you wanted to?
Notes: 0=0 percent (not at all confident); 100=100 percent (totally confident); -99=Decline to answer

ElementDescription: How confident are you right now that you would be able to cut down on your drinking if you wanted to?
Notes: 0=0 percent (not at all confident); 100=100 percent (totally confident); -99=Decline to answer

ElementDescription: Right now, how likely are you to cut back on your alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 10 = Very

ElementDescription: Right now, how important is it to you to cut back on your alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 10 = Very

ElementDescription: Right now, how confident are you that you could cut back on your alcohol use?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 10 = Very
